{bc}to aim a carping or snide attack

shortdef: to shoot at exposed individuals (as of an enemy's forces) from a usually concealed point of vantage
to aim a carping or snide attack

dt: {bc}a {d_link|sniper|snipe:2} employed to target and attack enemy snipers

dt.t: He had been a {wi}countersniper{/wi} for the security details assigned to protect Hamid Karzai in Afghanistan and Paul Bremer, the former American proconsul, in Iraq.

shortdef: a sniper employed to target and attack enemy snipers
